title: Bug 27422[SWT Examples] Progress bar reverts to 'black' color after Selection slider repositioning
OB: Bug 27422[SWT Examples] Progress bar reverts to 'black' color after Selection slider repositioning The color of the Progress Bar changes to the selected color5. Move the ‘Selection’ slider position!BUG!The progress bar color reverts to ‘black’Build 200211071448 on Solaris (also occurs on HPUX)
SR: Overview Description:In the 'SWT Controls' view of the SWT Examples software,under the ‘Progress Bar’ tab, the effect of setting the ‘Background’color is reset to ‘black’ after the ‘Selection’ slider position is moved.NOTE: The background color setting is still set (the color box forthe background color is still set to the custom color).Steps to recreate:1. Open the 'SWT Controls' view of the 'SWT Examples' code2. Open the ‘Progress Bar’ tab in the SWT Controls view3. Select the ‘Background Color’ button and change to a nonblackcolor4.
